title: Episode 35: King of Italy
description:
Bonaparte returns to Italy after Leoben, and is already coming into his own as a political figure. He is reunited with Josephine, and enjoys an opulent court life at Mombello. We trace Napoleon's development as a statesman as he defies the Directory and brings Venice and Genoa under French influence. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
